https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/71QijmvmtvfwFtF4vq2M41oJBca.jpg Maria Cecilia, a high school valedictorian originally from Venezuela but growing up in Miami, grapples with her fate and her identity as graduation day approaches. Meanwhile, her mother, Violeta, veers too close to a ghost from the past. And Gaby, her younger sister, swears she's found the answer to it all: winning the lottery. Bridges
